description:
This is an addicting puzzle game. Tap on a block to swap it with an adjacent block to match 3 or more blocks of the same color in a row to score points. There is no end to this game so just keep playing over and over again. 

The objective of this game is to swap one block with an adjacent block to form a chain of three or more blocks of the same color. This game runs until you restart it. There are seven different colored blocks. 

Scoring: you get 10 points for 3 blocks in a row and a bonus 10 for each additional block in a row. If the result of a match causes another match and additional 10 points for each resulting match will be awarded.
